help.back: back - set back if in away mode.
help.connection: connection - Show your active connection, address and port.
help.ctopic: ctopic - Connect topic - Open the link in hub topic in your default web browser.
help.dc: dc++ - Display link to DC++ web site.
help.df: df - Disc free - Display your used/free disc space.
help.dlsots: dslots (#) - Set no of download slots to #.
help.favorite: favorite - Add active hub to favorite.
help.fuldc: fuldc - Display link to fulDC web site.
help.fuptime: fuptime - Show fulDC uptime in mainchat. getlist (user) - Get users filelist. grant (user) - Grant user an extra slot. join (address:port) - Join a hub. lastlog [#] - Show last highlighted messages. # can be 1 to 100. lastseen (username) - Scroll up to last message sent by user. pm (username) [message] - Send a PM to user. popups (on/off) - Enable/disable popups. rebuild - Rebuild the hash-file. Deletes every entry which is not currently shared, making it smaller. refresh - Refresh your share. refreshi - Refresh the directories marked as incomming. search (search string) - Search for search string. share [full path to directory] - Share a directory. showjoins - Show joins/parts in mainchat. slots [#] - Set no of upload slots to #. topic - Show topic in mainchat. ts - Toggle timestamps in mainchat. unshare (full path to directory) - Unshare a directory. uptime - Show system uptime in mainchat.
